text.0: The efficacy of Moderna's mRNA #vaccine against #COVID19 — and severe illness in particular — was confirmed on Tuesday in data released by the FDA in advance of its vaccine advisory committee meeting this Thursday.
text.1: Three U.S. medical societies issue an update on joint recommendations for the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of #LymeDisease. https://t.co/NPbs12qMG3 https://t.co/fnaPFNBdfg
text.2: The NEJM Clinical Cases Resource Center aggregates educational content and interactive cases to help medical professionals advance their clinical diagnostic and therapeutic skills and to provide engaging resources for teaching, continuous learning, and professional development.
text.3: The efficacy of tocilizumab was tested in a randomized, controlled trial involving patients with #COVID19 who had fever, pulmonary infiltrates, or a need for supplemental oxygen. The treatment had no significant effect on disease progression or death.
text.4: In a trial of the BNT162b2 vaccine, subjects received two doses of vaccine or placebo 21 days apart. In 36,523 subjects with no evidence of prior #SARSCoV2 infection, there were 8 cases of #COVID19 in vaccine recipients and 162 cases with placebo, for a vaccine efficacy of 95%.
